mapper.update: update CXHNWX.T_USER set STAFF_CODE = #{staffCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STAFF_NAME = #{staffName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PASS_WORD = #{passWord,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PWD_END_TIME = #{pwdEndTime,jdbcType=DATE}, LASTEST_LOGIN_TIME = #{lastestLoginTime,jdbcType=DATE}, IS_VALID = #{isValid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, IS_LOCKED = #{isLocked,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, IP_ADDRESS = #{ipAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select ID, STAFF_CODE, STAFF_NAME, PASS_WORD, PWD_END_TIME, LASTEST_LOGIN_TIME, IS_VALID, IS_LOCKED, IP_ADDRESS from CXHNWX.T_USER where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select ID, STAFF_CODE, STAFF_NAME, PASS_WORD, PWD_END_TIME, LASTEST_LOGIN_TIME, IS_VALID, IS_LOCKED, IP_ADDRESS from CXHNWX.T_USER
